price: Fi àpèjúwe kan lélẹ̀ fún wọn nípa àwọn ará ìlú kan nígbà tí àwọn Òjíṣẹ́ wá bá wọn.
arabic: وَٱضۡرِبۡ لَهُم مَّثَلًا أَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلۡقَرۡيَةِ إِذۡ جَآءَهَا ٱلۡمُرۡسَلُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-iḍ'rib lahum mathalan aṣḥāba al-qaryati idh jāahā al-mur'salūna
